grid.gallery: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-x-6 gap-y-10

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/25
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-6 font-medium

cards.album: group relative aspect-square overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-muted transition-all hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-primary/10
cards.artist: aspect-[4/5] overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-muted relative group

player.container: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-24 backdrop-blur-2xl bg-background/80 border-t border-border/50 z-50 flex items-center px-8 justify-between
player.progress: h-1.5 bg-secondary rounded-full overflow-hidden cursor-pointer group-hover:h-2 transition-all

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-border bg-background/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

gradients.glow: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/60 to-transparent opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-500

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENTATION STRATEGY: Use Tailwind + Shadcn to achieve the 'Material/Apple' look. Do not install MUI.
THEME: Implement a robust Dark/Light mode toggle using 'next-themes'. Default to System.
PLAYER: The audio player must be persistent (Context API). It should float or stick to the bottom.
ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and hover effects. Keyframes: 'fade-in-up' for lists.
DASHBOARD: Keep the Artist Dashboard dense but legible. Use tables for track lists, cards for analytics.
NAVIGATION: Sidebar for Dashboard, Top Navbar for Marketplace.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all interactive elements have aria-labels and keyboard focus states.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use subtle noise or grain if possible.
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit' or a similar geometric sans.
Spacing is luxury. Don't crowd the UI.
All images must have alt text.
